alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 03 at 9:10PM CDT until April 05 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM TUESDAY TO 1 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Oklahoma, Harper, Woods, Ellis, Roger Mills, Beckham and Harmon Counties. In Texas, Hardeman, Foard and Knox Counties. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, from 7 PM Tuesday to 1 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
